feed.title: GitHub ABAP Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of ABAP in GitHub

entry.title: SAP-samples/security-services-tools
entry.summary: If you use security-related services and tools such as EWA, SOS, System Recommendations, Configuration Validation, or a security dashboard in SAP Solution Manager, the ABAP reports in this repository can help with further analysis and development.

entry.title: sandromancuso/trip-service-kata
entry.summary: Kata for a legacy code hands-on session. The objective is to write tests and refactor the given legacy code.
